featured.text: If this works, huge numbers of elderly and disabled people can regain their personal mobility.
When blinded, they can quickly regain the ability to see.
This suggested that GABA plays an important role in the fish’s ability to regain their sight.
They are indifferent to the regained weight.
They feel angry about the regained weight.

definition.zh_def: 重新獲得，恢復（失去的東西）
definition.en_def: to get back something that was lost or taken away
definition.example: She worked hard to regain her strength after the illness.
